RedisCacheSpec.EntryExpiryDays: enter redis cache entry expiry time in days

TokenCacheSpec.TenantId: azure active directory [ / azuread ] tenant id
TokenCacheSpec.ConfidentialClientRedirectUri: enter confidential client [ /web ] application / client redirect uri
TokenCacheSpec.ConfidentialClientSecret: enter confidential client [ /web ] application / client secret
TokenCacheSpec.UserId: provide using appsettings.User.json so does not get checked in
TokenCacheSpec.Username: provide using appsettings.User.json so does not get checked in
TokenCacheSpec.Password: provide using appsettings.User.json so does not get checked in
TokenCacheSpec.AuthorizationCode: provide using appsettings.User.json so does not get checked in
TokenCacheSpec.AccessToken: provide using appsettings.User.json so does not get checked in
